base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with four doors.
part_description: The cabinet has four doors, arranged in two vertical columns with two doors each. Each door features a vertical handle, centrally positioned. The cabinet is rectangular and stands upright.
internal_interaction_description: The doors are hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. The handles provide grip for opening the doors. Inside, shelves may be present to organize stored items, though they are not visible from the outside.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall and used for storage. People interact with it by opening the doors via the handles to access contents. It can hold various items, keeping them organized and out of sight.
